```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
# load
library(dplyr)
library(modelsummary)
library(kableExtra)

# simulate data
x <- rnorm(30)
w <- rnorm(30)
y <- x + w + rnorm(30)

# fit models
mod <- list()
mod[[1]] <- lm(y ~ x)
mod[[2]] <- lm(y ~ x + w)
mod[[3]] <- lm(y ~ x * w)

# summarize
msummary(mod, output = 'latex', title = 'This is a simple table.\\label{lab1}')
```
